query:
ALTER TABLE users 
ADD COLUMN referral_level ENUM('bronze', 'silver', 'gold', 'platinum') DEFAULT 'bronze' NOT NULL AFTER last_reset_at,
ADD COLUMN total_referrals INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL AFTER referral_level,
ADD COLUMN bonus_resumes INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL AFTER total_referrals,
ADD COLUMN unlimited_until TIMESTAMP NULL AFTER bonus_resumes;
